short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple todo list extension to remember and organize your daily tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allow users managing their daily tasks without close the browser with a minimalist and intuitive UI, it's a very simple functionality but a very helpful extension at the same time.

The users will be able to create, edit, delete and sort the todo items
